body_html:
@drpngx - I am closing this pull request because this problem only exists for builds that use contrib.mpi_collectives or contrib.mpi.

I have tried the default builds without MPI collectives and MPI support and MPI libraries including MVAPICH2-GDR work fine via the Horovod-MPI system available at: https://github.com/uber/horovod/

body:
@drpngx - I am closing this pull request because this problem only exists for builds that use contrib.mpi_collectives or contrib.mpi. 

I have tried the default builds without MPI collectives and MPI support and MPI libraries including MVAPICH2-GDR work fine via the Horovod-MPI system available at: https://github.com/uber/horovod/
